Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds significant value to both of us, as it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer promptly. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to potentially serving you with this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
